poem:
### The Politics of Health

Broken voices rise,  
clinging to what remains clear:  
truths tangled in veils.  
Retreat, they say, retreat—  
from the chorus of doubt,  
the tempest of mistrust.  
Silent science waits,  
its melody drowning  
in the clamor—a dance  
of faith and fiction,  
etched in our fragile  
human breath.
